FRGBColor
struct
FRGBColor

FRGBColor defines an RGB tuple defined in floating point.  Each color component is in the range of 0.0 to 1.0

Members
<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> r

R component

<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> g

G component

<uint8 at Caustic::uint8> b

B component

Module

import Imaging.Color
